definition: to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
see 沒關係|没关系[mei2 guan1 xi5]

sentences.english: It is not just about assuaging your conscience.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅是有关平息你的良心。

sentences.english: Some problems concerned with the mast cells in the cardiac wall were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中对心壁内这种细胞的有关问题进行了讨论。

sentences.english: Flow regime is an important character of three phase cocurrent flow.
sentences.chinese: 三相并流的流型与系统的动态特征有关。

sentences.english: What is the importance of the test of related substances for antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 试述抗生素药物有关物质检查的意义？

sentences.english: According to the story, the practice of hanging up stockings is connected with St. Nicholas.
sentences.chinese: 据传，悬挂袜子的习俗与圣尼古拉有关。

sentences.english: All participants were given a series of questions about the true self.
sentences.chinese: 所有参与者都要回答有关真实的自我的一系列问题。

sentences.english: Pictures of insurgents firing an anti-aircraft missile in Iraq .
sentences.chinese: 有关伊拉克叛乱分子发射防空导弹的录像。

sentences.english: You can find the information around this hotel from the information card in your room.
sentences.chinese: 有关本饭店的所有信息都在房间的信息卡上。

sentences.english: But the systematic position of Trimeniaceae is in dispute.
sentences.chinese: 但有关腺齿木科的系统位置存在争议。

sentences.english: The proceeds as generated from any rule-breaking trading shall be dealt with pursuant to the relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 在违规交易中所获利益，依照有关规定处理。

sentences.english: There was no longer any question of discovering a posteriori laws of social change.
sentences.chinese: 之后便不再有有关社会变革的法则出现。

sentences.english: Thus in this period, the subject concerning two-party system and party competes becomes hot point.
sentences.chinese: 因而这一时期有关两党制和党争的话题成为言论热点。

sentences.english: How does that ever allow you to advertise in connection with sports?
sentences.chinese: 这样你们就可以做与体育赛事有关的广告了？

sentences.english: But there are discrepancies in the timeline.
sentences.chinese: 但是在有关的时间先后问题上存在不一致的地方。

sentences.english: This article Legionella disease related to recent research carried out on the preliminary.
sentences.chinese: 本文就军团菌病有关研究近况进行了初步阐述。

sentences.english: Most cases detected in other provinces have been linked directly to the outbreak in Uige.
sentences.chinese: 在其它省发现的大多数病例与威热的暴发直接有关。

definition: pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
unrelated/having nothing to do (with sth else)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
